alert.note: Alert for Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 4:18PM EDT until July 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LOUISA...EAST CENTRAL GOOCHLAND...NORTHWESTERN HENRICO AND NORTHWESTERN HANOVER COUNTIES... At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oilville, or near Goochland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Goochland, Oilville, Wyndham, Montpelier, Laurel, Sandy Hook, Vontay, Coatesville, Johnsons Springs, Goodall, Short Pump, Mabelton, Rockville, Dabneys and Gilman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
